trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Import-Counter
trans-unit.target: 匯入計數器

trans-unit.source: Import-Counter
trans-unit.target: 匯入計數器

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Imports performance counter log files and creates the objects that represent each counter sample in the log.
trans-unit.target: 匯入效能計數器記錄檔，並建立代表記錄檔中的每個計數器樣本的物件。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: GetCounterSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: GetCounterSet （預設值）

trans-unit.source: ListSetSet
trans-unit.target: ListSetSet

trans-unit.source: SummarySet
trans-unit.target: SummarySet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Import-Counter** cmdlet imports performance counter data from performance counter log files and creates objects for each counter sample in the file.
trans-unit.target: **Import-counter** 指令程式從效能計數器記錄檔匯入效能計數器資料，並在檔案中建立每個計數器樣本的物件。

trans-unit.source: The **PerformanceCounterSampleSet** objects that it creates are identical to the objects that **Get-Counter** returns when it collects performance counter data.
trans-unit.target: **PerformanceCounterSampleSet** 物件，它會建立完全相同的物件， **Get-counter** 傳回時，它會收集效能計數器資料。

trans-unit.source: You can import data from comma-separated value (.csv), tab-separated value ( .tsv), and binary performance log (.blg) performance log files.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從逗點分隔值 (.csv)、Tab 分隔值 (.tsv) 與二進位效能記錄檔 (.blg) 效能記錄檔匯入資料。

trans-unit.source: If you are using .blg files, you can import up to 32 files in each command.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用.blg 檔案，您可以匯入每個命令中的最多 32 個檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can use the parameters of **Import-Counter** to filter the data that you import.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的參數 **Import-counter** 來篩選您匯入的資料。

trans-unit.source: Along with the Get-Counter and Export-Counter cmdlets, this feature lets you collect, export, import, combine, filter, manipulate, and re-export performance counter data within Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Get-counter 與 Export-counter 指令程式，以及這項功能可讓您收集、 匯出、 匯入、 合併、 篩選、 操作及重新匯出 Windows PowerShell 中的效能計數器資料。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Import all counter data from a file
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 從檔案匯入的所有計數器資料

trans-unit.source: This command imports all counter data from the ProcessorData.csv file into the $Data variable.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令匯入的所有計數器資料來自 ProcessorData.csv 檔案 $Data 變數。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Import specific counter data from a file
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 從檔案匯入特定的計數器資料

trans-unit.source: This command imports only the **"Processor(_total)\Interrupts/sec"** counter data from the ProcessorData.blg file into the $I variable.
trans-unit.target: 此命令只 **」 處理器 (_total) \Interrupts/sec"** 計數器資料從 ProcessorData.blg 檔案到 $我變數。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Select data from a performance counter then export it to a file
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 選取效能計數器資料，然後將它匯出至檔案

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to select data from a performance counter log file (.blg) and then export the selected data to a .csv file.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何從效能計數器記錄檔 (.blg) 中選取資料，然後將選取的資料匯出至 .csv 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The first four commands get the counter paths from the file and save them in the variable named $Data.
trans-unit.target: 前四個命令會從檔案取得計數器路徑，並將它們儲存在名為 $Data 的變數。

trans-unit.source: The last two commands import selected data and then export only the selected data.
trans-unit.target: 最後兩個命令匯入選取的資料，然後只匯出選取的資料。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Display all counter paths in a group of imported counter sets
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 顯示所有的計數器路徑在匯入的計數器集合群組

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to display all the counter paths in a group of imported counter sets.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何顯示匯入的計數器集合群組中的所有的計數器路徑。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Import counter data from a range of time stamps
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 匯入從範圍的時間戳記的計數器資料

trans-unit.source: This example imports only the counter data that has a time stamp between the starting an ending ranges specified in the command.
trans-unit.target: 此範例只會匯入時間戳記是在命令指定的開始與結束範圍之間的計數器資料。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Import a specified number of the oldest samples from a performance counter log file
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 從效能計數器記錄檔匯入指定的最舊的樣本數

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to import the five oldest and five newest samples from a performance counter log file.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何從效能計數器記錄檔匯入五個最舊和五個最新的樣本。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Get a summary of counter data from a file
trans-unit.target: 範例 7︰ 從檔案取得計數器資料的摘要

trans-unit.source: This command uses the *Summary* parameter of the **Import-Counter** cmdlet to get a summary of the counter data in the Memory.blg file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *摘要* 參數 **Import-counter** cmdlet 來取得 Memory.blg 檔案中的計數器資料的摘要。

trans-unit.source: Example 8: Update a performance counter log file
trans-unit.target: 範例 8︰ 更新效能計數器記錄檔

trans-unit.source: This example updates a performance counter log file.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會更新效能計數器記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Example 9: Import performance log data from multiple files and then save it
trans-unit.target: 範例 9︰ 從多個檔案匯入效能記錄資料，並儲存

trans-unit.source: This command imports performance log data from two logs and saves the data in the $Counters variable.
trans-unit.target: 此命令從兩個記錄檔匯入效能記錄資料，並將資料儲存在 $Counters 變數中。

trans-unit.source: The command uses a pipeline operator to send the performance log paths to Import-Counter, which imports the data from the specified paths.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用管線運算子將效能記錄檔路徑傳送至 Import-Counter，此 Cmdlet 會從指定的路徑匯入資料。

trans-unit.source: Notice that each path is enclosed in quotation marks and that the paths are separated from each other by a comma.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，每個路徑都以引號括住，而且路徑之間會以逗號分隔彼此。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Counter
trans-unit.target: 計數器

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, the performance counters.
trans-unit.target: 以字串陣列，指定效能計數器。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Import-Counter** imports all data from all counters in the input files.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Import-counter** 從輸入檔中的所有計數器匯入的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: Enter one or more counter paths.
trans-unit.target: 輸入一或多個計數器路徑。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted in the Instance part of the path.
trans-unit.target: 路徑中的執行個體部分允許萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: Each counter path has the following format.
trans-unit.target: 每個計數器路徑都具有下列格式。

trans-unit.source: The ComputerName value is required in the path.
trans-unit.target: 需要 ComputerName 值，則在路徑中。

trans-unit.source: For instance:
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說：

trans-unit.source: "\\\\\<ComputerName\>\\\<CounterSet\>(\<Instance\>)\\\<CounterName\>"
trans-unit.target: 「\\\\\<ComputerName\>\\\<CounterSet\>(\<執行個體\>)\\\<CounterName\>」

trans-unit.source: -EndTime
trans-unit.target: -結束時間

trans-unit.source: Specifies an end date and time that this cmdlet imports counter data between the *StartTime* and this parameter timestamps.
trans-unit.target: 指定結束日期及時間，此 cmdlet 會匯入之間的計數器資料 *StartTime* 和此參數的時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: Enter a **DateTime** object, such as one created by the Get-Date cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 **DateTime** 物件，例如 Get-date cmdlet 所建立。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Import-Counter** imports all counter data in the files specified by the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Import-counter** 匯入中所指定之檔案的所有計數器資料 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: -ListSet
trans-unit.target: -ListSet

trans-unit.source: Specifies the performance counter sets that are represented in the exported files.
trans-unit.target: 指定匯出檔案中所呈現的效能計數器集合。

trans-unit.source: Commands with this parameter do not import any data.
trans-unit.target: 具有此參數的命令不會匯入任何資料。

trans-unit.source: Enter one or more counter set names.
trans-unit.target: 輸入一或多個計數器集合名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: To get all counter sets in the file, type `Import-Counter -ListSet *`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得所有計數器集合檔案中，輸入 `Import-Counter -ListSet *`。

trans-unit.source: -MaxSamples
trans-unit.target: -MaxSamples

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of samples of each counter to import.
trans-unit.target: 指定每個計數器要匯入樣本的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Get-Counter** imports all of the data in the files specified by the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Get-counter** 匯入資料所指定的檔案中的所有 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the file paths of the files to be imported.
trans-unit.target: 指定要匯入之檔案的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此為必要參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter the path and file name of a, .csv,, .tsv, or .blg file that you exported by using the **Export-Counter** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑和檔案名稱的使用匯出 a、.csv、.tsv 或.blg 檔案 **Export-counter** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: You can specify only one .csv or .tsv file, but you can specify multiple .blg files (up to 32) in each command.
trans-unit.target: 您只可以指定一個 .csv 或 .tsv 檔案，但是您可以在每個命令中指定多個 (最多 32 個) .blg 檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe file path strings (in quotation marks) to **Import-Counter**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用檔案路徑的字串 （引號括住） 管線來 **Import-counter**。

trans-unit.source: -StartTime
trans-unit.target: -StartTime

trans-unit.source: Specifies the start date and time in which this cmdlet gets counter data.
trans-unit.target: 指定的開始日期和時間中此 cmdlet 會取得計數器資料。

trans-unit.source: Enter a **DateTime** object, such as one created by the **Get-Date** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 **DateTime** 物件，例如由 **Get-date** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Import-Counter** imports all counter data in the files specified by the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Import-counter** 匯入中所指定之檔案的所有計數器資料 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: -Summary
trans-unit.target: 摘要

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet gets a summary of the imported data, instead of getting individual counter data samples.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 會取得匯入的資料，而不是取得個別計數器資料範例的摘要。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe performance counter log paths to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送到此指令程式的效能計數器記錄檔路徑。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.PerformanceCounterSampleSet, Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.CounterSet, Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.CounterFileInfo
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.PerformanceCounterSampleSet，Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.CounterSet，Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.CounterFileInfo

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet returns a **Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.PerformanceCounterSampleSet**.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 會傳回 **Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.PerformanceCounterSampleSet**。

trans-unit.source: If you use the *ListSet* parameter, this cmdlet returns a **Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.CounterSet** object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 *ListSet* 參數，此 cmdlet 會傳回 **Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.CounterSet** 物件。

trans-unit.source: If you use the *Summary* parameter, this cmdlet returns a **Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.CounterFileInfo** object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 *摘要* 參數，此 cmdlet 會傳回 **Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetCounter.CounterFileInfo** 物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not have a *ComputerName* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式並沒有 *ComputerName* 參數。

trans-unit.source: However, if the computer is configured for Windows PowerShell remoting, you can use the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run an **Import-Counter** command on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果電腦已設定 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能，可以使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 執行 **Import-counter** 命令在遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.source: Export-Counter
trans-unit.target: 匯出計數器

trans-unit.source: Get-Counter
trans-unit.target: 取得計數器

trans-unit.target: Format-Table

trans-unit.source: Get-Date
trans-unit.target: 取得日期
